languages.text: {n}Безумец поднимает уцелевшую бровь в притворном удивлении.{/n} "Куда же ты пойдешь на этом проклятом Императором мире? Не к Арбитес ли? Тогда позволь нам тебя проводить. С так{mf|им|ой} почтенн{mf|ым|ой} гост{mf|ем|ьей} в заложниках мне не придется штурмовать укрепления. Они откроют ворота сами. Пасынки, убейте свиту нашего гостя, они будут мешать переговорам".

{n}The madman raises his only remaining eyebrow in mock surprise.{/n} "Pray tell, where on this Emperor-cursed world do you mean to go? Perhaps to the Arbites? Then, allow us to take you there. With such an esteemed guest for a hostage, I won't have to storm their fortifications: they will open the gates themselves. Stepchildren, kill our guest's retinue. They would encumber the negotiations."
languages.original_text: {n}Безумец поднимает уцелевшую бровь в притворном удивлении.{/n} "Куда же ты пойдешь на этом проклятом Императором мире? Не к Арбитес ли? Тогда позволь нам тебя проводить. They would encumber the negotiations."

languages.text: {n}El loco alza su única ceja restante para fingir sorpresa.{/n} «Dígame, ¿adónde piensa ir en este mundo maldito por el Emperador? ¿Con el Arbites, quizá? Permita que l{mf|e|a} acompañemos, entonces. Con un{mf||a} rehén de su calibre, ni siquiera tendremos que asaltar las fortificaciones; nos abrirán las puertas ellos mismos. Hijastros, matad al séquito de nuestr{mf|o|a} invitad{mf|o|a}. Molestarían en la negociación».
languages.original_text: {n}The madman raises his only remaining eyebrow in mock surprise.{/n} "Pray tell, where on this Emperor-cursed world do you mean to go? Perhaps to the Arbites? Then, allow us to take you there. With such an esteemed guest for a hostage, I won't have to storm their fortifications: they will open the gates themselves. Stepchildren, kill our guest's retinue. They would encumber the negotiations."

traits.locale_text: {n}El loco alza su única ceja restante para fingir sorpresa.{/n} «Dígame, ¿adónde piensa ir en este mundo maldito por el Emperador? ¿Con el Arbites, quizá? Permita que l{mf|e|a} acompañemos, entonces. Con un{mf||a} rehén de su calibre, ni siquiera tendremos que asaltar las fortificaciones; nos abrirán las puertas ellos mismos. Hijastros, matad al séquito de nuestr{mf|o|a} invitad{mf|o|a}. Molestarían en la negociación».

languages.text: {n}眼前的疯子扬起了他仅剩的一条眉毛，故作惊讶地开了口。{/n}“拜托你告诉我，在这个被帝皇诅咒的世界，你打算去什么地方？或许你打算去法务部的哨站？既然这样，不如让我们带你去吧。只要有了你这么尊贵的客人当人质，我们就不需要强攻他们的要塞了，他们会乖乖打开大门。继子团，把我们这位客人的随从统统杀光，不要让外人阻挠我们的谈判。”
languages.original_text: {n}The madman raises his only remaining eyebrow in mock surprise.{/n} "Pray tell, where on this Emperor-cursed world do you mean to go? Perhaps to the Arbites? Then, allow us to take you there. With such an esteemed guest for a hostage, I won't have to storm their fortifications: they will open the gates themselves. Stepchildren, kill our guest's retinue. They would encumber the negotiations."

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的疯子扬起了他仅剩的一条眉毛，故作惊讶地开了口。{/n}“拜托你告诉我，在这个被帝皇诅咒的世界，你打算去什么地方？或许你打算去法务部的哨站？既然这样，不如让我们带你去吧。只要有了你这么尊贵的客人当人质，我们就不需要强攻他们的要塞了，他们会乖乖打开大门。继子团，把我们这位客人的随从统统杀光，不要让外人阻挠我们的谈判。”

languages.text: {n}頭のおかしくなった男は、驚いたふりをして唯一残っている眉毛を上げる。{/n}「教えてくれ、この皇帝に呪われた惑星でどこに行こうってんだい？裁定局のところかい？では、俺たちが案内しよう。こんな立派な客が人質となりゃ、彼らの要塞を攻める必要がなくなる。向こうから門を開くだろう。連れ子たち、客人の従者を殺せ。交渉の邪魔になる」
languages.original_text: {n}The madman raises his only remaining eyebrow in mock surprise.{/n} "Pray tell, where on this Emperor-cursed world do you mean to go? Perhaps to the Arbites? Then, allow us to take you there. With such an esteemed guest for a hostage, I won't have to storm their fortifications: they will open the gates themselves. Stepchildren, kill our guest's retinue. They would encumber the negotiations."

traits.locale_text: {n}頭のおかしくなった男は、驚いたふりをして唯一残っている眉毛を上げる。{/n}「教えてくれ、この皇帝に呪われた惑星でどこに行こうってんだい？裁定局のところかい？では、俺たちが案内しよう。こんな立派な客が人質となりゃ、彼らの要塞を攻める必要がなくなる。向こうから門を開くだろう。連れ子たち、客人の従者を殺せ。交渉の邪魔になる」

languages.text: {n}Le malade mental hausse le seul sourcil qui lui reste en une expression de feinte surprise.{/n} « Allons bon, je serais curieux de savoir où vous pourriez bien aller sur ce monde maudit par l'Empereur ! Vous comptiez peut-être vous réfugier dans les jupes des arbitrators ? Dans ce cas, permettez qu'on vous y conduise. Avec un otage aussi précieux que vous, je n'aurai pas à assiéger leurs fortifications, ils m'ouvriront leurs portes spontanément. Tuez l'escorte de notre {mf|invité|invitée}, enfants de l'Imperium. Sa présence ne ferait que compromettre les négociations. »
languages.original_text: {n}The madman raises his only remaining eyebrow in mock surprise.{/n} "Pray tell, where on this Emperor-cursed world do you mean to go? Perhaps to the Arbites? Then, allow us to take you there. With such an esteemed guest for a hostage, I won't have to storm their fortifications: they will open the gates themselves. Stepchildren, kill our guest's retinue. They would encumber the negotiations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le malade mental hausse le seul sourcil qui lui reste en une expression de feinte surprise.{/n} « Allons bon, je serais curieux de savoir où vous pourriez bien aller sur ce monde maudit par l'Empereur ! Vous comptiez peut-être vous réfugier dans les jupes des arbitrators ? Dans ce cas, permettez qu'on vous y conduise. Avec un otage aussi précieux que vous, je n'aurai pas à assiéger leurs fortifications, ils m'ouvriront leurs portes spontanément. Tuez l'escorte de notre {mf|invité|invitée}, enfants de l'Imperium. Sa présence ne ferait que compromettre les négociations. »

languages.text: {n}Deli, sahte bir şaşkınlıkla sağlam kalan tek kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Zahmet olmazsa söylesene, İmparator adına lanetlenmiş bu dünyada nereye gitmeyi düşünüyorsun? Yargıcılara mı? O zaman müsaadenle biz götürelim. Böyle değerli bir misafirin rehinemiz olması, kalelerine kolaylıklar girmemizi sağlar. Kapıları bize açarlar. Üvey Evlatlar, misafirimizin maiyetindekileri öldürün. Müzakerede ortalığı karıştırmasınlar."
languages.original_text: {n}The madman raises his only remaining eyebrow in mock surprise.{/n} "Pray tell, where on this Emperor-cursed world do you mean to go? Perhaps to the Arbites? Then, allow us to take you there. With such an esteemed guest for a hostage, I won't have to storm their fortifications: they will open the gates themselves. Stepchildren, kill our guest's retinue. They would encumber the negotiations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deli, sahte bir şaşkınlıkla sağlam kalan tek kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Zahmet olmazsa söylesene, İmparator adına lanetlenmiş bu dünyada nereye gitmeyi düşünüyorsun? Yargıcılara mı? O zaman müsaadenle biz götürelim. Böyle değerli bir misafirin rehinemiz olması, kalelerine kolaylıklar girmemizi sağlar. Kapıları bize açarlar. Üvey Evlatlar, misafirimizin maiyetindekileri öldürün. Müzakerede ortalığı karıştırmasınlar."

languages.text: {n}Der Wahnsinnige hebt mit gespielter Überraschung seine verbliebene Augenbraue.{/n} "Nun sagt schon, wohin Ihr auf dieser vom Imperator verfluchten Welt wollt. Vielleicht zu den Arbites? Dann erlaubt uns, Euch hinzubringen. Mit einem so geschätzten Gast als Geisel muss ich nicht einmal ihre Befestigungen stürmen, weil sie die Tore freiwillig öffnen werden. Stiefkinder, tötet das Gefolge unseres Gastes. Sie würden die Verhandlungen erschweren."
languages.original_text: {n}The madman raises his only remaining eyebrow in mock surprise.{/n} "Pray tell, where on this Emperor-cursed world do you mean to go? Perhaps to the Arbites? Then, allow us to take you there. With such an esteemed guest for a hostage, I won't have to storm their fortifications: they will open the gates themselves. Stepchildren, kill our guest's retinue. They would encumber the negotiations."
